description: MainActivity.kt: Defines the main activity for a Tic Tac Toe Android app, including UI setup, game logic, and interactions. Builds the UI programmatically with themed styles, manages game state, handles user input, and updates the interface based on game progress.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity class handling the UI and game logic for the Tic Tac Toe game.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, builds UI components programmatically, and sets up event listeners.

methods.name: onCellClicked
methods.description: Handles user clicks on game cells, updates game state, and checks for win/draw conditions.

methods.name: updateStatus
methods.description: Updates the game status text based on current game state.

methods.name: disableAllCellsAfterGameOver
methods.description: Disables all game cells after game ends.

methods.name: resetGameWithAnimation
methods.description: Performs reset with fade-in animation after user clicks 'New Game'.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state, clears UI, and re-enables interaction.

methods.name: checkWin
methods.description: Checks if the specified player has a winning combination on the board.

methods.name: highlightWinningCells
methods.description: Highlights the winning line once a player wins.

methods.name: applyAlpha
methods.description: Adjusts the alpha transparency of a color.

methods.name: dp
methods.description: Converts density-independent pixels to actual pixels.
